unnormalised: ## Bharotant Velacheri Khep Dovorop: Ek Sope Margdarshak

Gujarattlo tumcho ixtt Mumbaichea tumchea ixtta poros poilimuch kuxik kitem dista mhonn tumkam kednaim dislam kai? Bharot ek vhoddlem khuxal kutumb disunk xokta, punn velachi bat yetakuch, vostu thoddeo... avghodd zatat. Odhikrutponnan, sogllea Bharotan Bhartachem Pramann Vel (IST) pallon kortat, jem GMT+5:30 asa. Hacho orth asa ami Greenwich Mean Time poros 5 ani dhedd horam mukhar asam. Bari sopeponn, nhoi? Puri tori nhoi!
normalised: Guvahattichea tumchea ixttak Mumbaiantle tumchea adimuch kiteak jagrut asta mhunn tumkam kednanch dubav aila? Bari, Bharat ek vhoddlem khuxal famil disonk xokta, punn vellachi zateli tor thoddim adchonneo yetat. Sarkarin, sogllo Bharat Bhartachem Pramannit Vell (I-S-T) pallo dita, jem G-M-T chya poros panch tis minutam fuddem asta. Hacho orth ami Greenwich Mean Time poros panch ani adhem vor fuddem asat. Kitlench soppe, khorem na? Poorn rupan nhoi!

unnormalised: Soglo dex *kaydexirponnan* IST pallta zalear, suryak mat tokrar asa. Ostentlea Gujarata ani udentlea Arunachala modemchea rekhaunxantlo forok boro asa. Itanagar-ant suryoday Dwarkaporos sumar 2 horam poilim zaunk xakta! Tumchem kamache divasachi survat 5:00 AM IST-ak korpachi kalpona kara keronn suryo poilimuch voir aila. Konnachi chai pausuy tem sudharunk xokona!
normalised: Sogllea dexant kanooneen I-S-T pallo ditalem, suria punn manunk toyar na. Gujarat dokxin ani Arunachal Pradesh udentchim antar vhoddlem asa. Itanagarant suryoday Dwarka poros sumar don voram adim zatlem! Tumcho kamache divas panch A-M I-S-T suru kortalo mhunn chintun pollya kiteak surio punn voir aylyat. Khainch chai paus hem sudraum zaina!

unnormalised: Purvil'lea kallant, desantlea suryoday ani suryastachea vellar bori sangat divpak don vel'liche kxetram asche vixim bhasabhas zal'li. Prostavit "Udenti Bharat Vel" GMT+6:30 astalem, vo IST+1 hor astalem. Hacho orth Asam, Meghalaya ani Nagaland sarkhea rajyamni asl'lea lokanchi ghoddiallim Bharotachea uril'lea bhagaporos ek hor mukhar astali. Tumchea ghoddiallak 60 minttam "fudak dhaddop" mhunn chinta.
normalised: Itihasant, don vellanchi zon bharti suryoday ani suryast vella poros boro mellovpachi charcha aslem. Astechem "Udent Bharatachem Vell" G-M-T chya poros so tis, vo I-S-T chya poros ek vor fuddem aasilem. Hacho orth Assami, Meghalaya, ani Nagaland sarkheal rajyantle lok Bharatachea urlelea poros ek vor fuddem aasilem. Tumchi ghodiyal sath minutam "prepone" korchea sarkhem chinta.

unnormalised: Filhal tori, IST-achi hukmat cholta. Hea karnnak lagun kednam kednam boreo gothnaneo ghoddtta. Udharonnacheponnan, ek cricket mel 14:30 IST-ak suru zata tem Bharotant tumi khunnu astam tache poros khunnem veglem dista. Udentant, te som'manacho chaha piyevpacho vell asa, zalear ostentant, donpar azun suru asa. Kampnicho odhikari vaakdyanchea nirdharonnachea vellar vo antim tarekhank to giney dhorpak poddtta.
normalised: Atak, I-S-T mukhel asta. Tem ekadrea velear thorav vellanchi sthiti vaddaunk xokta. Udharonn dilear, ek cricket match chouda tis I-S-T suru zalem Bharatant tumi kitle dusrea zagear asat mhunn bhogta. Udentiche vatten, tem chaiachem vellar sarkem asa, punn dokxin vatten, tem adim afternoon asta. Company-k zateli tor mhuttkyan velo ani kamachim nimn tharaunkuch poddlelim asta.

unnormalised: Tech pasun, Bharot ekach velachea kxetrapramann kam korta tori, bhugolik satyataicho orth asa vel desant vegveglleanubhuta yetat. Fuddlim tumi Bharotachea vegvegllea bhagantlo konnacho call nirdharit kortam, tumkam suryodayantlo forok ugddas dovorat, ani tankam tankanchi sokallichi chai bhogpak thoddo chodd vell divpak vichar korat!
normalised: Ani, Bharat ek vella zonacher kam korta, bhugolik satyata mhunn vella dexant dusrea lokanche bhogta. Tum tumchea dusrea Bharatachea vatten uloitalem tumhara udentiche vella yad dovor, ani thoddim timvanchi chaiachea vellar aanond ghe.
